name: Ext_R5_ServiceRequest_supportingInfo
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.ServiceRequest.supportingInfo for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents ServiceRequest.supportingInfo from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ServiceRequest|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4.

element.definition: Additional clinical information about the patient or specimen that may influence the services or their interpretations.     This information includes diagnosis, clinical findings and other observations.  In laboratory ordering these are typically referred to as "ask at order entry questions (AOEs)".  This includes observations explicitly requested by the producer (filler) to provide context or supporting information needed to complete the order. For example,  reporting the amount of inspired oxygen for blood gas measurements.
element.comment: `ServiceRequest.supportingInfo` maps to R4 `ServiceRequest.supportingInfo`. So is mapped as Equivalent. `ServiceRequest.supportingInfo` maps to R4 `ServiceRequest.supportingInfo`. So is mapped as Equivalent. `ServiceRequest.supportingInfo` maps to R4 `ServiceRequest.supportingInfo`. So is mapped as Equivalent.
